recipesJson.name: Yognog #FLV
recipesJson.author: dampfer78
recipesJson.description:
Sweetened Yogurt with Eggnog.
Very special mix, not convenient for everyone.

FLV Sweetness could be replaced by CAP Super Sweet @0.25%.
Maybe you need some extra Sweetness.

Optimized for 50/50 VG/PG vaped MTL in Flash-e-Vapor V4.5.
Originally developed for the #DevelopedFLV contest. I like it, but only one recipe is allowed.
